result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

CASES: 14CF179, 14CF195 & 14CF61.  CW-clerk 10:46 am.  
14CF179-Amended Information filed.  Count 2-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & enter JOC.  SENTENCE:  14CF179-32 days PCJ=time served. Waiving fine/costs. 
14CF195-Amended Information filed.  Count 1-guilty.  Count 2-guilty.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty, NOT enter JOC.  DJOC filed w/ court-12 mo DJOC.  Bond is amended to $1000 signature bond.  Bound by all non-monetary conditions including Defendant shall neither directly or indirectly threaten, harass, intimidate or otherwise interfere with victims or witnesses in this action.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.  No abusive contact w/ Ms Wallace. Not to possess or consume alcohol.  $250 DNA surcharge.  
Court modifies face of bonds, (now misd bonds), adding no abusive contact w/ Ms Wallace, striking not to be at 121 West Clayton Ave, Clayton.  Def to resign both bonds.
PP on surcharge of $25/mo starting 9/1/14.

14CF195-Count 3-DRI.  14CF61-DRI.  14CF179-Count 1 & 3-DRI.    11:16 am adj.

Defendant Bobby J June in court with attorney Ashley J Morse.  Kenneth N Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KK Clerk 1:14PM Atty Morse requesting to modify bond to no abusive contact with Sauna Wallace.  Court - Motion is denied.  Without Ms. Wallace present - will not modify bond at this time.  Sauna Wallace would need to be present at 1:00 on one day to request herself - bond modification may be considered at that time.  adj.  1:24 PM
Jury trial on September 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.
NOH for FPT on 5/16/14 to defendant
by ADA Tolan
Final pre-trial on May 16, 2014 at 10:30 am.

Info filed. Atty Morse- NG plea. Ct accepts plea. bond cont. JA to schedule PTC. 10:16am adj.
